LanguageData.VV_AbilityDisabledNoFood: {0_labelShort} cannot use this due to hunger
LanguageData.VV_GeneDefHoneyNeedDurationDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} must consume honey regularly to survive. Suffering from deficiency worsens over time if {PAWN_nameDef} does not consume honey within {DEFICIENCYDURATION}.
LanguageData.VV_ShowManaOverlayTooltip: Toggle environment mana overlay. \nEnvironmental mana is emitted or absorbed by rare plants or arcane plants, and it gradually spreads over time. \nWhen mana accumulates beyond a certain threshold, Vivia flowers may naturally appear, and some Vivi equipment can utilize environmental mana.
LanguageData.VV_ModSettings_AllowSelectModGenesDesc: Sets whether Vivi can use genes added in other mods when given random genes.
LanguageData.VV_Thing_SeedDesc:
A seed of {0}. When planted in soil or an arcane plant pot, it becomes a seedling, which will eventually grow into {0}.
Arcane plants require both mana and nutrients to grow. 
Mana is absorbed from the environment mana and can also be supplied by nearby mana emitter or other arcane plants that produce mana. 
utrients continuously decrease regardless of mana, so a person must regularly apply mana fertilizer. If left without sufficient nutrients for too long, the seedling will die.
